title: Leek, courgette and sweet potato soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/4 onion, finely chopped', '1 large potato, peeled and sliced', '1 teaspoon red chilli flakes, or to taste', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste', '2 leeks, washed and sliced', '2 courgettes, diced', '1 sweet potato, peeled and diced', '1 chicken or vegetable stock cube', '500ml water, or as needed', '1 or 2 tablespoons single cream, for serving']
